newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mitsui Fudosan falls on expected losses.
newsitem.headline: Mitsui Fudosan falls on expected losses.

text.p: Shares of Mitsui Fudosan Co Ltd fell in Thursday morning trade, discouraged by a newspaper report that the company is expected to post a parent current loss of more than 40 billion yen in 1996/97, traders said.
The share price of the real estate developer had eased 10 yen to 1,410 yen by 0122 GMT, with 298,000 shares traded.
The report, in Thursday's Nihon Keizai Shimbun, also said that the loss was likely to be covered by the sale of shares Mitsui Fudosan holds in Oriental Land Co Ltd, the operator of Tokyo Disneyland.
